class.name: AbilitySystemTagContainer
class.description: [AbilitySystemTagContainer] manages a set of tags and provides methods for hierarchical matching.

method.name: add_tag
method.description: Adds a tag to the container. If the tag already exists, increments its reference count. Returns [code]true[/code] if this is the first reference to the tag.

method.name: clear
method.description: Removes all tags from the container.

method.name: remove_tag
method.description: Decrements the reference count of a tag. If the count reaches zero, the tag is removed. Returns [code]true[/code] if the tag was actually removed (reference count reached zero).
